desc: X Item '--output directory' . PD Set the output profile directory
X Item '--verbose' . PD Set the verbose mode
X Item '--normalize <long_long_value>' . PD Normalize the profile
X Item '--scale float_or_simple-frac_value' . PD Scale the profile counters
X Item '--function' . PD Print function level overlap score
X Item '--fullname' . PD Print full gcda filename
X Item '--hotonly' . PD Only print info for hot objects/functions
X Item '--object' . PD Print object level overlap score
X Item '--hot_threshold <float>' . PD Set the threshold for hot counter value
